com.versant.util.backup
Interface BackupListener

public interface BackupListener

To signal and recover from different recoverable error conditions while backing up the database.

Method Summary
 boolean couldNotOpenDevice(BackupVisitor visitor)
          Get invoked when an existing backup device could not be opened to take backup.
 boolean mountNextDevice(BackupVisitor visitor)
          Get invoked when a next backup device is needed.
 

Method Detail

mountNextDevice

boolean mountNextDevice(BackupVisitor visitor)
Get invoked when a next backup device is needed. The method is expected to set the filename and possibly the capacity of the next backup device.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor object where the next device information needs to be set.
Returns:
true if the next device information is set using the visitor object, false if the backup needs to be aborted.

couldNotOpenDevice

boolean couldNotOpenDevice(BackupVisitor visitor)
Get invoked when an existing backup device could not be opened to take backup. The method is expected to set the filename and possibly the capacity of the correct backup device.

Parameters:
visitor - The visitor object where the next device information needs to be set.
Returns:
true if the next device information is set using the visitor object, false if the backup needs to be aborted.
